title: 044 - The Ficus/Bonsai Debate
description: On today's show, the guys address the protests and riots that are currently going on the United States and vouch to help you try to forget about things for awhile. They chat about a wild altercation they encountered over the weekend between two ex-lovers, Connor potentially getting sold a ficus instead of a bonsai tree by some snake oil salesman, they fact check some things from the last episode, talk about Tony's distaste for werewolves and vampires, and bounce around to a few other topics that pop up along the way. Stay safe out there, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
